nodes.text: Treasurer was a title used by various factions. In the Trade Federation, those who held the title were charged with the treasury department of the Federation, and thus oversaw its financial affairs. In 32 BBY, during the Subjugation of Naboo, the Neimoidian Hap Brehg was made treasurer of the Occupation Council. In Geelan society, each individual nest included a treasurer to help manage the group's business affairs.
